posts.post_content: Hi to all.  Trying to complete this set. If you have any you are interested in selling, please let me know.  I am interested in lower grade slabs. But would certainly consider raw.  Thanks for looking!

[quote name="ccre" post=1226709]Hi to all.  Trying to complete this set. If you have any you are interested in selling, please let me know.  I am interested in lower grade slabs. But would certainly consider raw.  Thanks for looking![/QUOTE]

Hi Dave
I have a near set for sale singly.......who are you looking for?  All of mine are graded and a bit lower grade but many look really nice even in their lower grade.....LL

Hey Leon,

Thanks for the reply.  I will send a PM as well.  I have 9 of the 16 and I am in need of Booles, Cooper, Cowell, Lane, Martin, Sisson, Walsh. If you could send pics and prices, I would be very appreciative.  Sincerely,

David
